item.title: Interesting Stuff - Week 15
item.description:
Throughout the week, I read a lot of blog-posts, articles, etc., that has to do with things that interest me:

  • data science
  • data in general
  • distributed computing
  • SQL Server
  • transactions (both db as well as non db)
  • and other “stuff”

This is the “roundup” of the posts that has been most interesting to me, this week.

item.title: Microsoft R Server
item.description: Last Saturday (February 18) I was in Cape Town at the second world-wide satRday conference ever, where I gave a talk named: “Microsoft, Open Source, R: You gotta be kidding me!“. The talk was about Microsoft’s R Server offering, and how it in some cases offered a better performance than Open R. Seeing the session lengths were only 20 minutes, I could not show any code, so in a “weak” moment I promised to put the code up on my web-site together with an accompanying blog-post. This is it :).
